column5: WWII Archive project:  http://www.ontarioveteranarchive.ca/  On the news tonight they had a story about a project to get stories and photos from Ontario WWII vets.  They also mentioned that right now about 500 WWII vets die every week in Canada.  Lest we forget.
Good stuff. The adopt a veteran program is particularly touching.  http://www.ontarioveteranarchive.ca/Adopt.aspx
thanks for posting this, I had an old 1939 star weekly I offered them due to this post
